function.name: find_information
function.description: Finds information on the web given a query. This function uses the Bing Search API to find information on the web given a query. The response includes the most relevant information from the web and should be used if you're not looking for news or people, places, or things.

query.description: An optimal search query to find information on the web using the Bing Search API

market.description: The market to search in, e.g. en-US - it should match the language of the query

function.name: find_entities
function.description: Finds entities on the web given a query. This function uses the Bing Search API to find entities on the web given a query. This should be used to find people, places, or things but not news or general information.

query.description: An optimal search query to find people, places or things on the web using the Bing Search API

market.description: The market to search in, e.g. en-US - it should match the language of the query

function.name: find_news
function.description: Finds news on the web given a query. This function uses the Bing Search API to find news on the web given a query. The response includes the most relevant news articles from the web and should be used if you're looking for news.

query.description: An optimal search query to find news on the web using the Bing Search API

market.description: The market to search in, e.g. en-US - it should match the language of the query
